#include<stdio.h>
#include<math.h>
#define gc getchar_unlocked
//#define MOD 1000000007
using namespace std;
void fastread(long *a){
    char c=0;	
    while(c<33){
    c=gc();}
    *a=0;
    while(c>33){
    *a=*a*10+c-'0';
    c=gc();
	}
}

bool isPrime(long n){
	
	int i=2;
	while(i<=sqrt(n)){
		if(n%i==0)
		return false;
		i++;
	}
	return true;
}

bool isPalindrome(long n){
	int i=n;
	long temp=0;
	while(n>0){
		
		long f=n%10;
		temp=temp*10+f;
		n=n/10;
	}
	if(temp==i) return true;
	return false;
}


int main(){
	
	long n;
	fastread(&n);
	if(n%2==0)
	 n++;
	for(int i=n;;i+=2){
		if(isPalindrome(i) && isPrime(i)){
			printf("%ld",i);
			break;
		}
		
	}  
}
